eval_cases.description: Test correct usage of Google search tool with proper parameters

parts.text: Find information about AI trends in 2025

Based on search results, key AI trends for 2025 include: 1) Multimodal AI systems combining text, vision, and audio, 2) AI agents performing complex multi-step tasks autonomously, 3) Increased focus on AI safety and alignment, 4) Edge AI deployment for real-time processing, 5) AI-powered scientific discovery in drug development and materials science.
